items.helpvalue:
A. Name, institution, and contact details of the Applicant (Principal Applicant)

Please ensure that a full postal address and a valid institutional e-mail address are included. In case of more than one affiliation, applicants are asked to only provide their contact information pertaining to the institution they are affiliated with for the purpose of this research project.

B. Name, institution, and contact details of the authorized institutional representative

Please include a full postal address and a valid institutional e-mail address.

items.description: If available, please provide the address of the research project website as well.

helpvalue:
D. Names of authorized personnel (within your institution)

Please provide the names of all investigators, collaborators, data managers and research staff that will have access to the research data in order to work on the research project. A valid institutional e-mail address for each name along with their job title and function is also required.

E. Names of authorized students (within your institution)

Please provide the names of all students who will have access to the research data in order to work on the project. A valid e-mail address for each name is required. Students at other institutions should not be included in this list.

items.helpvalue:
F. Research Project (scientific abstract)

Please provide a clear scientific description of the research project, its specific aims, methodology and deliverables and how it meets our objectives, in no more than 500 words. Also, please ensure to clearly explain how our research data will be used in the research project.

validationMessage.wordLimitError: The 500 words limit has been exceeded.

items.helpvalue:
G. Lay summary of the project

Please provide a short, accessible description of the project for the general public in no more than 200 words. Scientific jargon should be avoided to a reasonable extent. This description will be made available on the consortium public access registry and may be used in a variety of communications materials produced by the consortium (e.g. brochures, reports to stakeholders, press releases, blogs etc.).

validationMessage.wordLimitError: The 200 words limit has been exceeded.
